benchmark_details.name: ThemeVlogEval
benchmark_details.overview: ThemeVlogEval is a theme-based automated benchmarking framework for evaluating Vlog content generation. It features a wide range of topics, reference images, and style prompts, along with standardized, multidimensional evaluation metrics.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate reproducible research and fair comparison in Vlog generation tasks.

data.source: Custom dataset of reference images and themes generated with LLM-assisted generation and manual screening.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on comparisons between generated content and reference themes or styles.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in terms of narrative coherence, thematic consistency, and visual quality.
methodology.validation: Extensive comparative experiments demonstrated significant advantages over baseline methods.
